description:
On Friday, February 13, and Saturday, February 14, museum visitors are handed a paper heart valentine to place in front of their favorite masterpiece. Let the world know which artwork takes your breath away by sharing your pick on social media with #MIAhearts. Or keep the mystery alive as a secret admirer.

Read more about it at: http://new.artsmia.org/stories/showing-your-love-at-the-institute-of-hearts/
title: Minneapolis Institute of Hearts, Of Us and Art: The 100 Videos Project, Episode 08
